translations: 不匹配；[电][电子]失配；失谐
不匹配（mismatch 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: She was deliberately mismatching articles of clothing.
Some log files may be damaged because of size mismatching.
sentences.translation: 有些日志文件可能由于大小不匹配而被损坏。

sentences.sentence: Or worse, you could miss one and have subtle errors associated with mismatching values.
sentences.translation: 更糟糕的是，很可能会忽略了某个地方而没有改那个值，从而引起与不匹配的值相关的错误，这种错误是很隐蔽的。
